rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. The sum of the digits along the path of each arrow equals the digit in the circled cell. Digits may repeat within an arrow shape.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. The sum of the digits along the path of each arrow equals the digit in the circled cell. Digits may repeat within an arrow shape.
